author: makortel
body:
This PR suggests to move HGCal and MTD event content customizations from SimGeneral to SimCalorimetry and SimFastTiming, respectively, as a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24184#pullrequestreview-143639140.

Tested in 10_3_0_pre6, no changes expected.
title: Move HGCal and MTD event content customizations to SimCalorimetry and SimFastTiming
